articles.author: Sareen Habeshian
articles.title: White House exploring legality of sending U.S. citizens to foreign prisons - Axios
articles.description: Trump "would only consider this, if legal, for Americans who are the most violent, egregious, repeat offenders of crime," Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said.
articles.content:
The White House is "looking into" the legality of sending U.S. citizens to prisons in El Salvador, Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said during a briefing Tuesday.
